channel.title: What would be good for shops
channel.description: So, In my server, I need to add new shops... This is an Eco server keep that in mind. I'm just curious what you guys think would make up good shops for an eco server :P

item.title: What would be good for shops
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:452702”]dragon is rare, and should always be like that. My general rule of thumb is this.

-if a “rare” has more than 20 of it in the economy then something needs to be done to make it rarer or just take it out for a period of time

-as for rune, it’s a great way for skillers to make money :)[/quote]

You’ve actually got me thinking about it. Getting armor drops would be great, and could be the good source of money.

Read full topic
item.source: What would be good for shops

item.title: What would be good for shops
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

dragon is rare, and should always be like that. My general rule of thumb is this.

-if a “rare” has more than 20 of it in the economy then something needs to be done to make it rarer or just take it out for a period of time

-as for rune, it’s a great way for skillers to make money

Read full topic
item.source: What would be good for shops

item.title: What would be good for shops
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:452702”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=555577.msg4074120#msg4074120 date=1344638627]
Don’t add anything over or equal to mithril armor rarity
[/quote]fixed[/quote]

Rune and addy are fine, why would you want someone to work for them? Unless it’s the cash they need to work for to get it.

Read full topic

item.title: What would be good for shops
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

The only shops I actually advice you add are ones that include armor up to rune and possibly a few dragon weapons. When it comes to skill supplies, limit the items players can purchase. I would recommend only having things like seeds, tools, and a few gems. Keep in mind of things that are ‘want’ items and things that are required to train something.

Read full topic
item.source: What would be good for shops

item.title: What would be good for shops
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Just add something along the lines of RuneScape’s shops.

Read full topic
item.source: What would be good for shops

item.title: What would be good for shops
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

I myself like a challenge, I like shops up to about adamant in armour and you have to mine and smith for Rune also like up to maple in bows and you have to woodcut for yew and above etc, But that is just me.

Read full topic
item.source: What would be good for shops

item.title: What would be good for shops
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I like servers that have shops with variety in them. One server I played had a fuckton of shops but this meant there was much more variety when pking and whatnot rather than just rune, dragon, bandos, etc.

Read full topic
